archimate:Goal.name: Ensure training uptake and completition is traceable
archimate:Goal.documentation: Meeting with Mikael Lingskog 9/5: Measurement is important. Tracking the participation is the least we can do. Lingskog would like to be able to correlate the education's effectiveness to the reality in operations, but is skeptical about the feasability. REX and DEX measurements could possibly be the best opportunity for assessing the effectiveness besides tracking the participation.
